sections.title: Minor features
items: Prefill `skos:exactMatch` with https://regels.overheid.nl/concepts/<input/output.name> in Concepts tab

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Remove NL-SBB concepts header block captured as trailing comment lines while importing TTL file

versions.description: Explicit semantic linking between CPRMV rules and legal resources via cprmv:implements property

sections.title: Critical Bug Fix - Unique Rule URIs
items: CRITICAL FIX: Rule URIs now generated using full cprmv:ruleIdPath for guaranteed uniqueness
Previous bug: Multiple rules with same cprmv:id (e.g., 'onderdeel a.') resulted in duplicate URIs, causing RDF triple merging
Impact: TriplyDB was showing fewer unique entities than were present in the original file
New URI pattern: BWBR0015703_2026-01-01_0_Artikel-20_lid-1_onderdeel-a (includes full legal hierarchy)
URI sanitization: Commas‚Üíunderscores, spaces‚Üíhyphens, periods removed for URL-safe identifiers
Fallback: If ruleIdPath is unavailable, uses rulesetId_ruleId pattern (backward compatible)

sections.title: Semantic Linking Enhancement
items: Added cprmv:implements property to automatically link each CPRMV rule to its source legal resource
Rules now explicitly reference the legal resource they implement, eliminating ambiguous string-based matching
Versioned URI support: when eli:is_realized_by version exists, rules link to the versioned legal resource URI (e.g., https://wetten.overheid.nl/BWBR0011453/2025-01-01)
Unversioned fallback: rules link to base legal resource URI when no version is specified
Enables clean SPARQL queries with direct Service ‚Üí Legal Resource ‚Üê Rule traversal

sections.title: Policy Tab UX Improvements
items: Added informational banner showing which legal resource all rules will link to via cprmv:implements
Legal resource identifier displayed as clickable link opening legislation in new tab
Link always displays full URI for consistency (e.g., https://wetten.overheid.nl/BWBR0011453)
Version indicator shown when eli:is_realized_by is present (e.g., üìÖ Version: 2025-01-01)
Warning banner displayed when no legal resource is defined in Legal tab

sections.title: Data Model Benefits
items: Eliminates duplicate query results caused by string matching multiple legal resource versions
Makes data model more explicit and maintainable with direct semantic relationships
Supports temporal traceability by linking rules to specific legislation versions
Aligns with ELI vocabulary best practices for versioned legal resources
Reduces Linked Data Explorer query complexity by removing fragile rulesetId string parsing

sections.title: Multi-Vendor Integration Architecture
items: Transformed 'iKnow Mapping' tab into 'Vendor' tab with vendor selection dropdown
Vendor dropdown dynamically loads all RONL Method Concepts from TriplyDB
Selecting 'iKnow' from dropdown displays full iKnow integration functionality (Configure and Import modes)
All existing iKnow XML mapping features preserved: field mapping configuration, CognitatieAnnotationExport and SemanticsExport format support
Professional placeholder content for non-iKnow vendors showing implementation roadmap and status
Consistent vendor selection pattern matching Legal tab's Method dropdown
Scalable architecture for adding new vendor integrations in the future
Loading states and error handling for vendor list retrieval from TriplyDB

sections.title: Added support for selecting legislative analysis and rules management methodologies from the RONL vocabulary.
items: Added 'Analysis' dropdown on Legal tab for selecting legislative analysis methodology (Wetsanalyse JAS, Wetsanalyse JRM, FLINT)
Added 'Method' dropdown on Legal tab for selecting rules management methodology (16 options including ALEF, Avola, DMN, RuleSpeak, and more)
Dynamic loading of concepts from TriplyDB SPARQL endpoint (ronl vocabulary dataset)
Side-by-side dropdown layout with consistent field styling matching existing Legal tab fields
Full round-trip support: selected concepts are preserved in TTL export and correctly restored on import
Properties ronl:hasAnalysis and ronl:hasMethod link legal resources to RONL vocabulary concepts
Loading states with user-friendly feedback during SPARQL query execution
Comprehensive error handling for network issues with clear error messages

sections.title: Technical Implementation
items: New utility: src/utils/ronlHelper.js with fetchRonlConcepts() and fetchAllRonlConcepts() functions
New state properties: ronlAnalysis and ronlMethod in useEditorState hook
Backend proxy endpoint /v1/triplydb/query used for CORS-free SPARQL queries
Concepts fetched from https://api.open-regels.triply.cc/datasets/stevengort/ronl/services/ronl/sparql
SPARQL queries filter for Dutch labels using FILTER(LANG(?prefLabel) = 'nl')
TTL generation: ronlAnalysis and ronlMethod added to generateLegalResourceSection()
Parser: parseTTLEnhanced() updated to extract ronl:hasAnalysis and ronl:hasMethod
Import handler: applyImportedData() updated to apply RONL concept state
Console logging for debugging: 'Parsed RONL Analysis' and 'Parsed RONL Method' messages

versions.description: Enhanced DMN type detection, CVDR legal resource support, and UI improvements

sections.title: DMN Type Detection
items: DMN files now read typeRef from <variable> elements for accurate type detection
Added intelligent birth date generation (random age 25-68 years) for demographic variables
Enhanced boolean pattern detection with Dutch keywords: alleenstaand, uitkering, voedselbank, kwijtschelding, schuldhulp, inwoner
Fallback pattern matching for legacy DMN files without typeRef declarations
Auto-generated request bodies now respect DMN semantic types (boolean, number, string, date)

sections.title: Legal Resource Support
items: Added CVDR (Municipal/Local Regulations) support alongside BWB (National Legislation)
Legal tab now accepts CVDR IDs (e.g., CVDR603544) from lokaleregelgeving.overheid.nl
Automatic repository detection with visual badges (BWB = blue, CVDR = purple)
Smart URI generation: CVDR includes version number (/1), BWB uses standard format
Quick links to view documents in appropriate repository
Enhanced validation to support both BWB and CVDR identifier patterns

sections.title: User Interface
items: Compact tab navigation: reduced padding and font size to eliminate horizontal scroll
Improved tab spacing (px-3, py-2.5, text-sm) for better screen space utilization
All 10 tabs now fit without scrollbar on standard screen widths
Maintained icon size (18px) for optimal clickability and visual balance

sections.title: NL-SBB Concept Layer for DMN Variables - Complete
items: Phase A: Automatic concept generation from DMN test results with Dutch NL-SBB standard compliance
Phase B: Full import/export support - concepts preserved in round-trip TTL workflows
Phase C: Complete editable UI with add/edit/delete operations for all concept properties
Clean separation architecture with skos:Concept definitions for all DMN inputs and outputs
Bidirectional linking: concepts link to technical variables via dct:subject
Foundation for semantic matching across different DMNs using skos:exactMatch

sections.title: Editable Concepts Tab
items: Edit preferred labels, definitions, notations, and exact match URIs
Edit variable names with automatic URI updates
Separate 'Add Input Concept' and 'Add Output Concept' buttons
Auto-scroll and focus on newly added concepts
Delete individual concepts with confirmation
Visual distinction between input (blue) and output (green) concepts
Read-only 'Linked To' field shows connection to DMN variables

sections.title: Import/Export & Integration
items: Concepts automatically parsed from imported TTL files
Perfect preservation in round-trip workflows
Clearing DMN data now also clears associated concepts
ConceptScheme correctly excluded from concept parsing
Badge shows accurate concept count (inputs + outputs)
Empty state guides users through DMN upload workflow

sections.title: Semantic Interoperability Foundation
items: Variables from different DMNs can now be semantically matched via skos:exactMatch
Support for cross-DMN equivalence declarations (e.g., geboortedatum = birthdate)
Human-readable labels auto-generated from camelCase variable names
Unique notation codes generated for each concept
Dutch language definitions following NL-SBB standard
Enables advanced chain validation and cycle detection in Linked Data Explorer

sections.title: Organization Logo Management
items: Upload organization logos (JPG/PNG) with automatic resizing to 256√ó256px
Live preview with file size and encoding information
Remove and replace logo functionality
Automatic publishing to TriplyDB as asset files
TTL generation with foaf:logo and schema:image properties
File validation (max 5MB, image formats only)

sections.title: Semantic Linking Improvements
items: Added ronl:implements link from DMN to Service
Complete RDF graph traversal: DMN ‚Üí Service ‚Üí Organization ‚Üí Logo
Bidirectional service-DMN relationships
Enhanced SPARQL query capabilities for logo resolution

sections.title: Technical Implementation
items: Canvas-based image resizing with aspect ratio preservation
Base64 encoding for state management
TriplyDB asset API integration
Asset filename generation based on organization identifier
Enhanced TTL parser for logo import/export
Graceful degradation if asset upload fails
Import Limitation: When importing a TTL file, the logo will be a reference to the asset file, not the actual base64 data
TriplyDB Only: Logo upload to TriplyDB only works when publishing

sections.title: Direct Publishing to TriplyDB
items: Added 'Publish' button next to Validate and Download buttons
Direct upload of generated TTL files to TriplyDB datasets
Configuration dialog for TriplyDB settings (API URL, account, dataset, token)
Test connection functionality to verify TriplyDB credentials
Secure token storage in browser localStorage
Real-time status feedback during publishing
Automatic validation before publishing
Support for file size up to 5MB (TriplyDB API limit)

sections.title: Technical Implementation
items: Created triplydbHelper.js utility module for API integration
Implemented PublishDialog component for configuration UI
Extended useEditorState hook with TriplyDB configuration state
Added publish status notifications with auto-hide
Integration with existing validation workflow
Configuration persistence across sessions

sections.title: Security Features
items: Secure API token handling with show/hide toggle
Security reminders in configuration dialog
Token storage only in browser (never on server)
Authentication via Bearer token as per TriplyDB standards

sections.title: Fix Incomplete Modularization
items: Removed TTL generation code for DMN from dmnHelpers.js
Moved all TTL generation code for DMN to ttlGenerator.js
Extract outputs from DMN as well (was only inputs)

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed: auto-generated request body shows empty value whicht causes the DMN evaluation to return null outputs

sections.title: Further Modularization
items: Phase 1: Extracted state management to useEditorState hook
Phase 2: Extracted TTL generation to TTLGenerator class
Phase 3: Centralized import logic in importHandler.js
Phase 4: Created useArrayHandlers hook for DRY array operations
Better code organization and maintainability

sections.title: RPP Architecture Alignment
items: Implemented Rules--Policy--Parameters (RPP) Separation pattern visualization
Added RPP layer badges to Rules (Blue), Parameters (Green), CPRMV/Policy (Purple) tabs
Color-coded tab navigation with distinct colors per RPP layer
Added explanatory banners with architecture context in each tab
Included RPP pattern flow descriptions: Legislation ‚Üí Policy ‚Üí Rules ‚Üí Parameters
Maintained CPRMV API link and example data functionality

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed: Missing cprmv:hasDecisionModel link in Service section when DMN is present
Fixed: Organization dct:identifier now shows short ID instead of full URI
Fixed: DMN section now appears when importing TTL with DMN (was checking fileName instead of hasDMN())
Fixed: File input reset issue - can now import same file multiple times
Fixed: iKnow mappings persist correctly after Clear All and Import operations
Fixed: Array sections (Rules/Parameters/CPRMV) now show immediately when + button clicked
Fixed: Changed hasTemporalRules/hasParameters/hasCprmvRules to check array length instead of field values

sections.title: DMN Import Preservation
items: Automatic detection of DMN data in imported TTL files
Perfect preservation of DMN blocks during import/export cycles
Property ronl:implementedBy documents which software system executes the decision logic
Clear visual indication of imported DMN status
Ability to clear and recreate DMN data

sections.title: DMN Integration
items: Upload DMN files, deploy to Operaton, and test decision evaluations
Uses dct:source placeholder URI for where the actual DMN file is stored
Property ronl:implementedBy documents which software system executes the decision logic
Documents the required inputs with: Variable name, Data type (String, Integer, Boolean), Example value (from test)
Links back to the DMN model with cpsv:isRequiredBy

sections.title: DMN Import Preservation
items: Automatic detection of DMN data in imported TTL files
Perfect preservation of DMN blocks during import/export cycles
Clear visual indication of imported DMN status
Ability to clear and recreate DMN data

sections.title: Baseline feature iKnow Integration
items: Parses iKnow XML exports (CognitatieAnnotation or Semantics format)
Maps XML data to CPSV-AP fields using configurable mappings
Imports mapped data into the editor tabs (Service, Legal, Parameters, etc.)
Provides Load Example button to both Configure and Import modes to help users understand the iKnow integration with a working example

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed missing cpsv:implements (creates a direct link from each rule to the service it implements, making the relationship explicit)

sections.title: Minimal CPSV-AP 3.2.0 Compliance Achieved
items: Fixed Organization class type to cv:PublicOrganisation
Added mandatory  cv:spatial field to Organization
Added explicit dct:identifier outputs for Service, Organization, Legal Resource, Cost, and Output
Changed cpsv:follows to cv:hasLegalResource
Added mandatory Rule identifiers and titles
Created Cost and Output sections in Service tab with full import/export support
Fixed Language URI
Fixed Sector URIs
Load Example button next to Import JSON the loads example CPRMV Rules

sections.title: UI Improvements
items: Moved footer info to Changelog tab and added documentation reference links
Added CPRMV Rules Serve API info to CPRMV tab
Changed favicon

sections.title: Modularization
items: Extracted utils and Changelog tab
Extracted Service, Organization, Legal, Rules and Parameter tabs
Created Preview side panel and removed Preview tab

sections.title: CPRMV Tab
items: Added dedicated CPRM tab for cprmv:{...} support
Import JSON function with for all mandatory CPRMV fields
Download TTL includes CPRMV rules in correct format
Import TTL populates CPRMV tab if rules exist

sections.title: Clear All Button
items: Added "Clear All" button with confirmation dialog
Safe data clearing - requires explicit confirmation
Resets all form fields to initial state
Success notification after clearing

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed: Parameters with ronl:ParameterWaarde now import correctly
Fixed: Organization name displays from skos:prefLabel
Fixed: Sequential imports now clear previous data properly
Fixed: Eliminated uncontrolled input console warnings

sections.title: UI Improvements
items: Increased Rules section description field from 2 to 10 rows for better visibility
Expanded Preview section to display ~80 lines of TTL code (from ~20 lines)
Enhanced user experience for viewing and editing longer content

sections.title: Parameters Tab
items: Added dedicated Parameters tab for ronl:ParameterWaarde support
Define constants: income limits, asset thresholds, percentages
Fields: Notation, Label, Value, Unit (EUR/PCT/NUM/etc.), Description
Temporal validity: validFrom and validUntil dates
Add/remove unlimited parameters dynamically

sections.title: Technical Improvements
items: Added schema.org namespace for parameter values and units
schema:value for numeric parameter values (xsd:decimal)
schema:unitCode for measurement units
Full import/export support for parameters
Updated NAMESPACE-PROPERTIES.md with schema: prefix

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed: BWB ID import now correctly strips c_ prefix from legal resources
Fixed: Special character escaping in TTL strings (quotes, newlines)
Fixed: URI encoding for identifiers with spaces (%20 encoding)
Fixed: Filename sanitization for downloads

sections.title: Import Functionality
items: Import existing TTL files for editing
Automatic parsing of CPSV-AP/CPRMV structures
Populates all form fields from imported data
Supports multiple temporal rules
Handles service, organization, legal, and rule data
Success/error status messages with visual feedback

sections.title: Character Handling
items: Proper TTL string escaping (quotes, backslashes, newlines)
URI encoding for spaces and special characters
Round-trip editing: export ‚Üí import ‚Üí edit ‚Üí export
W3C Turtle specification compliance

sections.title: Core Features
items: React-based web application with Create React App
Tailwind CSS v3 for modern, responsive design
Lucide React icons for visual clarity
5-tab interface: Service, Organization, Legal, Rules, Preview
Real-time TTL preview with syntax highlighting

sections.title: Form Capabilities
items: Service metadata: identifier, name, description, thematic area
Organization details: name, identifier, homepage
Legal resources: BWB IDs with pattern validation
Temporal rules: extends, validFrom, validUntil, confidence levels
Dynamic rule management: add/remove rules

sections.title: Export & Standards
items: Generate valid RDF/Turtle files
CPSV-AP 3.0 compliance (EU standard)
CPRMV 0.3.0 support (Dutch extensions)
RONL vocabulary integration
Download TTL files with proper namespaces
Basic validation with error messages

sections.title: Deployment
items: Deployed to Azure Static Web Apps
Custom domain: ttl.open-regels.nl
Automatic CI/CD via GitHub Actions
Free tier hosting with SSL
Professional branding and favicon
